# Feature Proposals\n\nThis directory contains SDD+BDD feature proposals generated by the Unified Product Architect (UPA) agent.\n\nEach proposal follows the canonical template from `.specify/templates/proposal-template.md`.\n\n## Naming Convention\n\n```\nfeat-NNN-<kebab-case-name>.md\n```\n\n## Validation\n\nAll proposals are validated by CI on PR (`validate-proposals.yml`):\n- File naming pattern\n- SDD structure (6 required sections)\n- BDD structure (User Stories + Gherkin)\n- Gherkin syntax (Given/When/Then)\n
